segments.text: do you have any plans for Friday night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , my hosue-mates and I are having a house-warming party . Would you like to come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure . Would it be alright if I brought a few friends ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: will there be a lot of people there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sure hope so . We've each invited about 10 people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: who else is going to be there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm inviting my friends from work , you , my sister , and a few friends from school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know your sister . She's very nice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: don't worry.You won't be sitting there by yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: what time is it going to start ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: most people are working Friday night , so it's going to start around 9 pm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we'll have beer and snacks , but if you want to bring a bottle of wine , that'd be great .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could also bring some music if you want . I've got loads of songs on my new iPod .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that'd be great . I'll see you then !
segments.speaker: S1
